tool.name: Query Exome Variant Server
tool.description: based on position, gene name or id

param.name: input
param.label: Please enter your chromosone and region OR gene name OR (NCBI) Gene Id
param.help: Region needs to be in a format like so: chr:startPos-endPos eg. 4:85748-47483. Gene name for example is abcg2.

tool.help:
This tool returns data based on given exome region or gene.
For details about this tool, please go to http://evs.gs.washington.edu/EVS/
